comments.en:
For basic printing functionality use the HPIJS driver . For advanced functionality such as printer status and maintenance features, use the HPLIP driver (which includes HPIJS).

An 8MB wide-format inkjet.

Adobe Postscript 3 option available, but it appears to be a software-only thing.

The 1220Cse and 1220Cxi are the same printer, with different toy Windows software.

This printer differs from the 12 0 0C in that this is a PCL 3 (deskjet flavoured language) printer, while the 1200C is a PCL 5c (laserjet flavoured language) printer.

A wide assortment of deskjet-ish drivers should work.

The best output one gets with HP's HPIJS 1.3 or newer. If you cannot update to HPIJS 1.3 for some reason, you can also use HPIJS 1.2.2 with the patches from Matthias Bunte and Richard Spencer-Smith ("hpijs-rss"). The Gimp-Print driver also works (Model setting: "pcl-900"), but only up to 600 dpi.
